Summary: Red/white flashing lights that move unlike any known aircraft followed by 2 what seemed to be jets?
divs: Sighting Detailsoutside watching the skies. there have been alot of weird sightings in indiana in the last year it seems.. so me and another witness kept watching the skies, we kept telling ourselves that we were probably seeing jets and airplanes .. but it kept circling the area.. which was weird cause jets and planes don't change direction that fast, either it was doing that or there were more than 1 aircraft it was showing up on all sides of us.. within minutes going east then going west. then going north.. we recorded one instance of this thing defying physics of what ordinary aircraft are able to . it like jumps straight down then straight up again 2 times, then increases in altitude .. shortly afterward there were 2 other aircraft with just blue and red lights on it "not blinking" following the direction of these things we saw.. and im pretty sure i got at least 1 of them on film also.. as soon as i get this video up i will make it available to you if you wish to see it.
